metaTitle: Santa’s Special Key | The Christmas Elf
metaContent: Santa’s Special Key is ideal when you don’t have a chimney. Help Father Christmas get in to deliver your presents this Christmas.

product.title: Santa's Special Key
product.caption: Santa's Special Key
info: If you don't have a chimney how can  Father Christmas get in to deliver your presents?
Simply leave this magical key outside your front door on Christmas Eve. It only works for Father Christmas so is perfectly safe.
